descr.p: "My Love" is a love song by Paul McCartney and Wings, and is the most successful track from their 1973 album Red Rose Speedway. McCartney wrote it about his feelings for his wife Linda, who was also in the band. The song was also released as a single in March 1973, reaching number one on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and number nine in the UK Singles Chart.
The song also appeared on the Wings compilation album Wings Greatestand the Paul McCartney compilation album All the Best!A Live Version appears on Good Evening New York City

"My Love"has been covered by several vocal artists, including Cher, Cass Elliott, Salena Jones, Mina and Shinehead. There have also been two jazz instrumental cover versions, by Ivan "Boogaloo Joe" Jones and Pieces of a Dream.
An orchestral version was played when Monica and Chandler got married on the hit US sitcom Friends.
